Class Dog

java.lang.Object
  Dog

public class Dog
extends java.lang.Object

The dog class constructs a dog and can calculate its age in human years and validate its dog tag. I have neither given nor recived unauthorized aid on this assignment.

Since:
2015.9.25
Version:
2015.9.2015

Jonathan Damico
